title: About Data Science (HW1)
text: I think of a Data Scientist as an advanced Data Analyst. A Data Analyst tends to look at current data and pulls important insights and trends that help drive business decisions and solve problems. A Data Scientist takes that idea even further by performing predictive analytics using ML on large datasets to extract meaningful insights.

title: About Data Science (HW1)
text: I think of a Data Scientist as an advanced Data Analyst. title: About Data Science (HW1)
section: What differences/similarities do you see between data scientists and statisticians?
text:
What differences/similarities do you see between data scientists and statisticians?
Both fields work in data but have a different approach. Data Scientists tend to focus on computational analysis of the data and data modeling while Statisticians focus on topics such as inference and statistical theory.

Data Scientist: Machine Learning, Big Data, Data Engineering, Python and R, tend to work in tech companies (finance, marketing, healthcare)
Statisticians: Theoretical foundations of statistical methods, experimental design, hypothesis testing, probability theory, tend to work in research (e.g., pharmaceuticals).
